title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       New! Please use the following links to access our webcams as we resolve issues with our website.  KYVC webcam | ML webcam                      Kohm Yah-mah-nee Webcam Enjoy a view of Mt. Diller and Pilot Pinacle from the north side of the Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center.   View webcam                              Manzanita Lake webcam View of the northwest slope of Lassen Peak from the shore of Manzanita Lake.   View webcam                 Share Your Photos or Videos  See your photo on the Lassen Annual Park Pass, park publications, website, and social media sites by sharing your media with the park or submitting an entry to the annual photo contest.           Park Photos View and download photos of Lassen Volcanic National Park on our Flickr site or view other photo galleries here.          Lassen Peak Crater Loop Audio Tour Download audio files and take a self-guided tour through the crater at the summit of Lassen Peak.         Virtual Tours Explore Lassen's new Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center on an e-tour.                         LassenPeek1 Join ranger Todd Jesse for a step back into history as we celebrate the 100th anniversary of the Lassen Peak eruptions plus trail conditions during the spring opening season.  Duration:3 minutes, 23 seconds
